languages.text: Некий злоумышленник на Кьяве Гамма был идентифицирован как Деменц Ханейманн. Паскаль желает установить его личность и покарать.
The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.
languages.original_text: Некий злоумышленник на Кьяве Гамма был идентифицирован как Деменц Ханейманн. Паскаль желает установить его личность и покарать.

traits.locale_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.
The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星的罪魁祸首名叫德曼兹·哈努曼。帕斯卡希望能确认此人的真实身份，对其进行惩罚。
languages.original_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星的罪魁祸首名叫德曼兹·哈努曼。帕斯卡希望能确认此人的真实身份，对其进行惩罚。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマの犯人はデメンツ・へニュマンと名付けられた。パスカルは身元を確認し、処罰を下したいと考えている。
languages.original_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマの犯人はデメンツ・へニュマンと名付けられた。パスカルは身元を確認し、処罰を下したいと考えている。

languages.text: Se ha determinado que el culpable de la tragedia de Kiava Gamma se llama Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal quiere confirmar su identidad y castigarlo.
languages.original_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

traits.locale_text: Se ha determinado que el culpable de la tragedia de Kiava Gamma se llama Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal quiere confirmar su identidad y castigarlo.

languages.text: Der Übeltäter auf Kiava Gamma heißt Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal verlang, dass seine Identität bestätigt und eine Strafe verhängt wird.
languages.original_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

traits.locale_text: Der Übeltäter auf Kiava Gamma heißt Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal verlang, dass seine Identität bestätigt und eine Strafe verhängt wird.

languages.text: Le coupable de Kiava Gamma s'appelait Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal souhaite confirmer son identité et le punir.
languages.original_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

traits.locale_text: Le coupable de Kiava Gamma s'appelait Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal souhaite confirmer son identité et le punir.

languages.text: Kiava Gama'daki suçlunun adı, Dementz Haneumann idi. Pasqal, kimliğini doğrulayıp cezasını vermek istiyor.
languages.original_text: The culprit on Kiava Gamma was named as Dementz Haneumann. Pasqal wishes to confirm his identity and punish him.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama'daki suçlunun adı Dementz Haneumann idi. Pasqal kimliğini doğrulamak ve cezasını vermek istiyor.
